definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: SO2 is a colourless gas with a sharp odour.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化硫是一种无色气体，带有刺鼻的气味。

sentences.english: The dissipated sulfur dioxide was absorbed by the lime cream and applied for preparation of the calcium hydrogen sulfite.
sentences.chinese: 放出的二氧化硫经石灰乳吸收用来制备亚硫酸氢钙。

sentences.english: And the tin bath was contaminated by SO2.
sentences.chinese: 锡槽内已被二氧化硫气体污染。

sentences.english: The CAAA were designed to reduce SO2 and NOx air emissions.
sentences.chinese: 这个CAAA被设计来减少排放的二氧化硫和空气。

sentences.english: METHODS Method of coughing stimulated by sulphur dioxide and method of phenol red were used.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用二氧化硫刺激法和气管段酚红法进行试验。

sentences.english: Soak disposable chopstick in hot water before use to release carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 宜先用热水浸泡，时间越久二氧化硫释出越多。

sentences.english: The determination of SO_2(sulphur dioxide) pure gas with iodine quantity method is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用碘量法进行二氧化硫纯气的测定工作。

sentences.english: Burning a tyre, by contrast, produces sulphur dioxide, a noxious pollutant.
sentences.chinese: 相反，燃烧轮胎会产生有害的污染物，二氧化硫。

sentences.english: Sulphur dioxide can shroud the planet in a cooling haze.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化硫可以把地球包裹在一层冷却的雾霭中。

sentences.english: It also avoids the release of the pollutants sulphur dioxide and nitrogen dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 它还能避免污染物二氧化硫和二氧化氮的产生。

sentences.english: Wines were often dosed with sulphur dioxide to control any infection.
sentences.chinese: 为控制感染，酒当中通常会添加一些二氧化硫。

sentences.english: SO2 can affect the respiratory system and the functions of the lungs, and causes irritation of the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化硫可影响呼吸系统和肺功能，并刺激眼睛。

sentences.english: Bright patches visible on Io are regions of sulfur dioxide frost.
sentences.chinese: 木卫一上的亮斑是二氧化硫的结晶区。

sentences.english: It's simply not putting out enough ash and sulfur dioxide to cause cooling.
sentences.chinese: 它喷出的火山灰和二氧化硫还远不足让气温下降。

sentences.english: Cooling and purification of the sulfur dioxide process gas.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化硫工业气体的冷却和净化。

definition: fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
